title: Sins placed on shoulders when we pray and some sins fall off when we prostrate? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Abdul Majeed or Abdul Mujib from the UK. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh. Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Barakatuh. Sheikh, I just wanted to confirm if this hadith is authentic please. I'm going to read it in English if you don't mind please. It says, when the slave stands and stands to pray, all of his sins are brought and placed on his head and shoulders. Whenever he bows or prostrates, the falls of I just want to confirm if it's authentic. This is authentic to my knowledge and Allah knows best.
